body: #### PR description: * Torus replaced with Tubs - @bsunanda, please, comment * Overlaps in EE eliminated Mixture of `Torus` and `Tubs` shapes where some of the`Torus` shapes extrude each other: Calculations for the `Tubs` radii are based on squaring the circle, e.g. the new shapes should have an equivalent material budget: Thickness of the cooling pipes left unchanged.
